mapper.insert: insert into board (b_id, b_title,b_content, member_id, file_gid) values(seq_bid.nextval ,#{b_title},#{b_content},'임재민',1)
mapper.update: update board set b_title =#{b_title}, b_content =#{b_content} where b_id = #{b_id}
mapper.select: select x.b_id,x.b_title, x.b_content,x.b_cnt,x.member_id, x.b_regdate from ( select rownum as rnum, a.b_id,a.b_title, a.b_content,a.b_cnt,a.member_id, a.b_regdate from ( select b_id,b_title, b_content,b_cnt,member_id, b_regdate from board order by b_id) a where rownum <= (#{perPageNum}*#{page})) X where X.rnum >= (#{page}-1)*10
select count(b_id) from board where b_id > 0
